<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands">ARMConstantIslands</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands">ARMConstantIslands</a> - Due to limited PC-relative displacements, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm">ARM</a> requires constant pool entries to be scattered among the instructions inside a function. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/cpuser">CPUser</a></>}>
CPUser - One user of a constant pool, keeping the machine instruction pointer, the constant pool being referenced, and the max displacement allowed from the instruction to the CP. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/cpuser/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/cpentry">CPEntry</a></>}>
CPEntry - One per constant pool entry, keeping the machine instruction pointer, the constpool index, and the number of CPUser&#39;s which reference this entry. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/cpentry/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/immbranch">ImmBranch</a></>}>
ImmBranch - One per immediate branch, keeping the machine instruction pointer, conditional or unconditional, the max displacement, and (if isCond is true) the corresponding unconditional branch opcode. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/immbranch/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

### jumpTableFollowsTB() {#a22895e7a8fa9fc2f5a3306dd7aebbb33}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns whether CPEMI is the first instruction in the block immediately following JTMI (assumed to be a TBB or TBH terminator).

If so, we can switch the first register to PC and usually remove the address calculation that preceded it.

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-armconstantislandpass-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ARMConstantIslands - Due to limited PC-relative displacements, ARM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// requires constant pool entries to be scattered among the instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// inside a function.  To do this, it completely ignores the normal LLVM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// constant pool; instead, it places constants wherever it feels like with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// special instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The terminology used in this pass includes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Islands - Clumps of constants placed in the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Water   - Potential places where an island could be formed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   CPE     - A constant pool entry that has been placed somewhere, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///             tracks a list of users.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armconstantislandpass-cpp-/armconstantislands/#a6ab5453e9f3f4ed83c6bb9e4ebd68b20">ARMConstantIslands</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass/#a29c81d2386f4a727c6d33413807530c8">MachineFunctionPass</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;ARMBasicBlockUtils&gt; BBUtils = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// WaterList - A sorted list of basic blocks where islands could be placed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// (i.e. blocks that don&#39;t fall through to the following block, due</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// to a return, unreachable, or unconditional branch).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;&gt; WaterList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// NewWaterList - The subset of WaterList that was created since the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// previous iteration by inserting unconditional branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;, 4&gt;</a> NewWaterList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">water&#95;iterator = std::vector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;::iterator;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// CPUser - One user of a constant pool, keeping the machine instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// pointer, the constant pool being referenced, and the max displacement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// allowed from the instruction to the CP.  The HighWaterMark records the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// highest basic block where a new CPEntry can be placed.  To ensure this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// pass terminates, the CP entries are initially placed at the end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// function and then move monotonically to lower addresses.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// exception to this rule is when the current CP entry for a particular</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// CPUser is out of range, but there is another CP entry for the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// constant value in range.  We want to use the existing in-range CP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// entry, but if it later moves out of range, the search for new water</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// should resume where it left off.  The HighWaterMark is used to record</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// that point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">CPUser &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CPEMI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;HighWaterMark;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxDisp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NegOk;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSoImm;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CPUser(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;mi, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;cpemi, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> maxdisp,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad137f00752c91478230b01c851768605">neg</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> soimm)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">        : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>(mi), CPEMI(cpemi), MaxDisp(maxdisp), NegOk(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad137f00752c91478230b01c851768605">neg</a>), IsSoImm(soimm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">        HighWaterMark = CPEMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// getMaxDisp - Returns the maximum displacement supported by MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// Correct for unknown alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// Conservatively subtract 2 bytes to handle weird alignment effects.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getMaxDisp()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (KnownAlignment ? MaxDisp : MaxDisp - 2) - 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// CPEntries - Keep track of all of the constant pool entry machine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// instructions. For each original constpool index (i.e. those that existed</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to reorder and otherwise adjust the block layout to make good use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the TB&#91;BH&#93; instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MadeChange = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GenerateTBB &amp;&amp; <a href="#adc09bbb30c18788e0bc6ee68ad36a2e6">AdjustJumpTableBlocks</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Data is out of date, so clear it. It&#39;ll be re-computed later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    T2JumpTables.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Blocks may have shifted around. Keep the numbering up to date.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MF-&gt;RenumberBlocks();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For most inputs, it converges in no more than 5 iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it doesn&#39;t end in 10, the input may have huge BB or many CPEs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, we will try different heuristics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CPChange |= handleConstantPoolUser(i, NoCPIters &gt;= <a href="#a15898f9a72ea6bb8b53d6695dac7f419">CPMaxIteration</a> / 2);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(dumpBBs());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Perform the initial placement of the regular constant pool entries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// To start with, we put them all at the end of the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">ARMConstantIslands::doInitialConstPlacement(std::vector&lt;MachineInstr&#42;&gt; &amp;CPEMIs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the basic block to hold the CPE&#39;s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = MF-&gt;CreateMachineBasicBlock();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3b1dce1f3354a357fb9061bb7568a84e">push&#95;back</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MachineConstantPool measures alignment in bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> MaxAlign = MCP-&gt;getConstantPoolAlign();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxLogAlign = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(MaxAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark the basic block as required by the const-pool.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a8cb665c210dc8e43f537cf4c9b84e2c7">setAlignment</a>(MaxAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The function needs to be as aligned as the basic blocks. The linker may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// move functions around based on their alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Special case: halfword literals still need word alignment on the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> FuncAlign = MaxAlign;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxAlign == 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FuncAlign = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(4);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MF-&gt;ensureAlignment(FuncAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Order the entries in BB by descending alignment.  That ensures correct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment of all entries as long as BB is sufficiently aligned.  Keep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// track of the insertion point for each alignment.  We are going to bucket</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sort the entries as they are created.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock::iterator, 8&gt;</a> InsPoint(MaxLogAlign + 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                       BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add all of the constants from the constant pool to the end block, use an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// identity mapping of CPI&#39;s to CPE&#39;s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;MachineConstantPoolEntry&gt; &amp;CPs = MCP-&gt;getConstants();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;TD = MF-&gt;getDataLayout();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = CPs.size(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = CPs&#91;i&#93;.getSizeInBytes(TD);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = CPs&#91;i&#93;.getAlign();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify that all constant pool entries are a multiple of their alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not, we would have to pad them out so that instructions stay aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;CP Entry not multiple of 4 bytes!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert CONSTPOOL&#95;ENTRY before entries with a smaller alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LogAlign = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> InsAt = InsPoint&#91;LogAlign&#93;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CPEMIs.push&#95;back(CPEMI);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CPEMI. This is bucket sort with iterators.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> a = LogAlign + 1; a &lt;= MaxLogAlign; ++a)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Moved CPI#&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; i &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; to end of function, size = &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, align = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Alignment.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// getUserOffset - Compute the offset of U.MI as seen by the hardware</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// displacement computation.  Update U.KnownAlignment to match its current</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ARMConstantIslands::getUserOffset(CPUser &amp;U)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UserOffset = BBUtils-&gt;getOffsetOf(U.MI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;BasicBlockInfo&gt;</a> &amp;BBInfo = BBUtils-&gt;getBBInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo">BasicBlockInfo</a> &amp;BBI = BBInfo&#91;U.MI-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getNumber()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a> = BBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a5f264104cc3a87ed07dd196d281ccd2c">internalKnownBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The value read from PC is offset from the actual instruction address.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">  UserOffset += (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armasmprinter-cpp/#ac74d5e6c2cf6e4a41c5cd533e7f88fad">isThumb</a> ? 4 : 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because of inline assembly, we may not know the alignment (mod 4) of U.MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure U.getMaxDisp() returns a constrained range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">  U.KnownAlignment = (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a> &gt;= 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On Thumb, offsets==2 mod 4 are rounded down by the hardware for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// purposes of the displacement computation; compensate for that here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For unknown alignments, getMaxDisp() constrains the range instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armasmprinter-cpp/#ac74d5e6c2cf6e4a41c5cd533e7f88fad">isThumb</a> &amp;&amp; U.KnownAlignment)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UserOffset &amp;= ~3u;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UserOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// isOffsetInRange - Checks whether UserOffset (the location of a constant pool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reference) is within MaxDisp of TrialOffset (a proposed location of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// constant pool entry).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// UserOffset is computed by getUserOffset above to include PC adjustments. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the mod 4 alignment of UserOffset is not known, the uncertainty must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// subtracted from MaxDisp instead. CPUser::getMaxDisp() does that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ARMConstantIslands::isOffsetInRange(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UserOffset,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrialOffset, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxDisp,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NegativeOK, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSoImm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UserOffset &lt;= TrialOffset) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// User before the Trial.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TrialOffset - UserOffset &lt;= MaxDisp)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Make use full range of soimm values.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// findAvailableWater - Look for an existing entry in the WaterList in which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// we can place the CPE referenced from U so it&#39;s within range of U&#39;s MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns true if found, false if not.  If it returns true, WaterIter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is set to the WaterList entry.  For Thumb, prefer water that will not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// introduce padding to water that will.  To ensure that this pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// terminates, the CPE location for a particular CPUser is only allowed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// move to a lower address, so search backward from the end of the list and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// prefer the first water that is in range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ARMConstantIslands::findAvailableWater(CPUser &amp;U, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UserOffset,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            water&#95;iterator &amp;WaterIter,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CloserWater) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WaterList.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BestGrowth = ~0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea7b774effe4a349c6dd82ad4f4f21d34c">u</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The nearest water without splitting the UserBB is right after it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the distance is still large (we have a big BB), then we need to split it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if we don&#39;t converge after certain iterations. This helps the following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// situation to converge:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   BB0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      Big BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   BB1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      Constant Pool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When a CP access is out of range, BB0 may be used as water. However,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserting islands between BB0 and BB1 makes other accesses out of range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;UserBB = U.MI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf6442108e21e7e5379feb8962de65b7">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad73672265cf2227fb29130e76b73cb3f">BBInfoVector</a> &amp;BBInfo = BBUtils-&gt;getBBInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> CPEAlign = getCPEAlign(U.CPEMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinNoSplitDisp = BBInfo&#91;UserBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3aa22d521bd6a7e6b9f35545dc7b0f1e">getNumber</a>()&#93;.postOffset(CPEAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CloserWater &amp;&amp; MinNoSplitDisp &gt; U.getMaxDisp() / 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (water&#95;iterator IP = std::prev(WaterList.end()), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = WaterList.begin();;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><span class="doxyHighlight">       --IP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a>&#42; WaterBB = &#42;IP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if water is in range and is either at a lower address than the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current &quot;high water mark&quot; or a new water block that was created since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the previous iteration by inserting an unconditional branch.  In the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// latter case, we want to allow resetting the high water mark back to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this new water since we haven&#39;t seen it before.  Inserting branches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should be relatively uncommon and when it does happen, we want to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sure to take advantage of it for all the CPEs near that block, so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we don&#39;t insert more branches than necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When CloserWater is true, we try to find the lowest address after (or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// equal to) user MI&#39;s BB no matter of padding growth.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Growth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isWaterInRange(UserOffset, WaterBB, U, Growth) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (WaterBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3aa22d521bd6a7e6b9f35545dc7b0f1e">getNumber</a>() &lt; U.HighWaterMark-&gt;getNumber() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><span class="doxyHighlight">         NewWaterList.count(WaterBB) || WaterBB == U.MI-&gt;getParent()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Growth &lt; BestGrowth) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the least amount of required padding seen so far.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BestGrowth = Growth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WaterIter = IP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Found water after &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af7881286e3ea4d7f1c4a63c87c132dac">printMBBReference</a>(&#42;WaterBB)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep looking unless it is perfect and we&#39;re not looking for the lowest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible address.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// createNewWater - No existing WaterList entry will work for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CPUsers&#91;CPUserIndex&#93;, so create a place to put the CPE.  The end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// block is used if in range, and the conditional branch munged so control</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unconditional branch around it.  In either case NewMBB is set to a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is not adjusted).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Delta = isThumb1 ? 2 : 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the offset where the CPE will begin.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CPEOffset = UserBBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a">postOffset</a>(CPEAlign) + Delta;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Split at end of &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af7881286e3ea4d7f1c4a63c87c132dac">printMBBReference</a>(&#42;UserMBB)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewMBB = &amp;&#42;++UserMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add an unconditional branch from UserMBB to fallthrough block.  Record</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it for branch lengthening; this new branch will not get out of range,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but if the preceding conditional branch is out of range, the targets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be exchanged, and the altered branch may be out of range, so the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// machinery has to know about it.</span></CodeLine>
