<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// What a big block.  Find a place within the block to split it.  This is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// little tricky on Thumb1 since instructions are 2 bytes and constant pool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entries are 4 bytes: if instruction I references island CPE, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction I+1 references CPE&#39;, it will not work well to put CPE as far</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// forward as possible, since then CPE&#39; cannot immediately follow it (that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// location is 2 bytes farther away from I+1 than CPE was from I) and we&#39;d</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to create a new island.  So, we make a first guess, then walk through</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the instructions between the one currently being looked at and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible insertion point, and make sure any other instructions that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reference CPEs will be able to use the same island area; if not, we back</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// up the insertion point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to split the block so it&#39;s fully aligned.  Compute the latest split</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// point where we can add a 4-byte branch instruction, and then align to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Align which is the largest possible alignment in the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> = MF-&gt;getAlignment();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> &gt;= CPEAlign &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Over-aligned constant pool entry&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a> = UserBBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a5f264104cc3a87ed07dd196d281ccd2c">internalKnownBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UPad = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca36878e37b708e22ace80dececead61">UnknownPadding</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseInsertOffset = UserOffset + U.getMaxDisp() - UPad;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Split in middle of big block before %#x&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              BaseInsertOffset));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The 4 in the following is for the unconditional branch we&#39;ll be inserting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (allows for long branch on Thumb1).  Alignment of the island is handled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inside isOffsetInRange.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BaseInsertOffset -= 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, adjusted to %#x&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, BaseInsertOffset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; la=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; kb=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; up=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; UPad &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This could point off the end of the block if we&#39;ve already got constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pool entries following this block; only the last one is in the water list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Back past any possible branches (allow for a conditional and a maximally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// long unconditional).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BaseInsertOffset + 8 &gt;= UserBBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a">postOffset</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure BaseInsertOffset is larger than the offset of the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// following UserMI so that the loop which searches for the split point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iterates at least once.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BaseInsertOffset =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::max(UserBBI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a">postOffset</a>() - UPad - 8,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 UserOffset + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;UserMI) + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the CP is referenced(ie, UserOffset) is in first four instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after IT, this recalculated BaseInsertOffset could be in the middle of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an IT block. If it is, change the BaseInsertOffset to just after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IT block. This still make the CP Entry is in range becuase of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// following reasons.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 The initial BaseseInsertOffset calculated is (UserOffset +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   U.getMaxDisp() - UPad).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 An IT block is only at most 4 instructions plus the &quot;it&quot; itself (18</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bytes).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3 All the relevant instructions support much larger Maximum</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   displacement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = UserMI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> PredReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = UserOffset + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;UserMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOpcode() != ARM::t2IT &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a665fdb3ba0c480903e8c1902f4d29e61">getITInstrPredicate</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, PredReg) != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armcc/#ac8391dd6b8083baa870dee5142ff22b6a8b2ef77967dee1220cc6ee5aee595e11">ARMCC::AL</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = std::next(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BaseInsertOffset =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::max(BaseInsertOffset, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != UserMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Fell off end of block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Move inside block: %#x\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, BaseInsertOffset));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EndInsertOffset = BaseInsertOffset + 4 + UPad +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CPEMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = UserMI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CPUIndex = CPUserIndex+1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumCPUsers = CPUsers.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;LastIT = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = UserOffset + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;UserMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt; BaseInsertOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getInstSizeInBytes(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = std::next(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> != UserMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Fell off end of block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CPUIndex &lt; NumCPUsers &amp;&amp; CPUsers&#91;CPUIndex&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> == &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CPUser &amp;U = CPUsers&#91;CPUIndex&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isOffsetInRange(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, EndInsertOffset, U)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift intertion point by one unit of alignment so it is within reach.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BaseInsertOffset -= <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EndInsertOffset -= <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is overly conservative, as we don&#39;t account for CPEMIs being</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reused within the block, but it doesn&#39;t matter much.  Also assume CPEs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are added in order with alignment padding.  We may eventually be able</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to pack the aligned CPEs better.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EndInsertOffset += U.CPEMI-&gt;getOperand(2).getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CPUIndex++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember the last IT instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOpcode() == ARM::t2IT)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastIT = &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  --<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid splitting an IT block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastIT) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> PredReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armcc/#ac8391dd6b8083baa870dee5142ff22b6">ARMCC::CondCodes</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a665fdb3ba0c480903e8c1902f4d29e61">getITInstrPredicate</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, PredReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armcc/#ac8391dd6b8083baa870dee5142ff22b6a8b2ef77967dee1220cc6ee5aee595e11">ARMCC::AL</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = LastIT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid splitting a MOVW+MOVT pair with a relocation on Windows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On Windows, this instruction pair is covered by one single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IMAGE&#95;REL&#95;ARM&#95;MOV32T relocation which covers both instructions. If a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant island is injected inbetween them, the relocation will clobber</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the instruction and fail to update the MOVT instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (These instructions are bundled up until right before the ConstantIslands</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (STI-&gt;isTargetWindows() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armasmprinter-cpp/#ac74d5e6c2cf6e4a41c5cd533e7f88fad">isThumb</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOpcode() == ARM::t2MOVTi16 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1535"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(2).getTargetFlags() &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armii/#ac33037e230d127af6de7945ce02e7e5aa0e45cd4ab4a729746f756f8d92e231b4">ARMII::MO&#95;OPTION&#95;MASK</a>) ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1536"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armii/#ac33037e230d127af6de7945ce02e7e5aa7cbf61a60ec67440fb388b9373dc1148">ARMII::MO&#95;HI16</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1537"><span class="doxyHighlight">    --<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ARMConstantIslands::handleConstantPoolUser(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CPUserIndex,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute this only once, it&#39;s expensive.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See if the current entry is within range, or there is a clone of it</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (result==1) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No existing clone of this CPE is within range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will be generating a new clone.  Get a UID for it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> = AFI-&gt;createPICLabelUId();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  water&#95;iterator IP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (findAvailableWater(U, UserOffset, IP, CloserWater)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Found water in range\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;WaterBB = &#42;IP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the original WaterList entry was &quot;new water&quot; on this iteration,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagate that to the new island.  This is just keeping NewWaterList</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new CPE goes before the following block (NewMBB).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewMBB = &amp;&#42;++WaterBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    createNewWater(CPUserIndex, UserOffset, NewMBB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// splitBlockBeforeInstr adds to WaterList, which is important when it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// called while handling branches so that the water will be seen on the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Always align the new block because CP entries can be smaller than 4</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CmpMI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a079add9cf3b7069c79b91a3d8c7c28a3">findCMPToFoldIntoCBZ</a>(Br.MI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ImmCmp.MI = CmpMI;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We queried for the CBN?Z opcode based upon the &#39;ExitBB&#39;, the opposite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// target of Br. So now we need to reverse the condition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a86730e94ae6fdf0fe3145b2acc88dea8ac9b4c62f6dc1bc5caf3c768b687cbf7e">Cmp</a>.NewOpc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a86730e94ae6fdf0fe3145b2acc88dea8ac9b4c62f6dc1bc5caf3c768b687cbf7e">Cmp</a>.NewOpc == ARM::tCBZ ? <Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The order in which branches appear in ImmBranches is approximately their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order within the function body. By visiting later branches first, we reduce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the distance between earlier forward branches and their targets, making it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more likely that the cbn?z optimization, which can only apply to forward</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches, will succeed.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2064"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unconditional branch. However, the logic has now been reversed with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2065"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CBN?Z being the conditional branch and the LE being the unconditional</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// While trying to form a TBB/TBH instruction, we may (if the table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2096"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// doesn&#39;t immediately follow the BR&#95;JT) need access to the start of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2097"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// jump-table. We know one instruction that produces such a register; this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function works out whether that definition can be preserved to the BR&#95;JT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// possibly by removing an intervening addition (which is usually needed to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we hope that we have at least these instructions in the basic block:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     BaseReg = t2LEA ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#91;...&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     EntryReg = t2ADDrs BaseReg, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#91;...&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     t2BR&#95;JT EntryReg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have to be very conservative about what we recognise here though. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// main perturbing factors to watch out for are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    + Spills at any point in the chain: not direct problems but we would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      expect a blocking Def of the spilled register so in practice what we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      can do is limited.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    + EntryReg == BaseReg: this is the one situation we should allow a Def</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      of BaseReg, but only if the t2ADDrs can be removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    + Some instruction other than t2ADDrs computing the entry. Not seen in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      the wild, but we should be careful.</span></CodeLine>
